reviewText: Loved the series. Great stories right from the police blotter. Makes you feel that you were back in the day!!! Great purchase. I hope this series makes it way to TV rather than some of fictitious stories they want us to believe.. These are the real thing!!!
You never know what you're going to get with these old television series, but this one is better that I expected in terms of contrast and sound quality.  Nice addition to my collection.
Not bad....some episodes are a bit fuzzy but hey, what do you expect from early 1950's B&W shows.
